unnormalised: The wedding season is upon us, and if you're planning a big fat Indian wedding, securing the perfect venue is more chaotic than finding a decent auto-rickshaw at 11 PM. Word on the street (or should we say, the wedding planner grapevine) is that "The Grand Imperial Palace" at 123, Ring Road, Delhi, 110007, is booked solid till 2026. Apparently, even Mukesh Ambani couldn's get a booking.
normalised: The wedding season is upon us, and if you're planning a big fat Indian wedding, securing the perfect venue is more chaotic than finding a decent auto-rickshaw at eleven P-M. Word on the street (or should we say, the wedding planner grapevine) is that "The Grand Imperial Palace" at one hundred and twenty three, Ring Road, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and seven, is booked solid till two thousand and twenty six. Apparently, even Mukesh Ambani couldn't get a booking.

unnormalised: Another hot spot, "The Royal Gardens," located at Plot No. 456, Sector 29, Gurgaon, Haryana, 122001, has a waiting list longer than the queue for biryani at a Hyderabad wedding. We heard a rumour that folks are now offering their ancestral lands in exchange for a slot! Talk about serious dedication.
normalised: Another hot spot, "The Royal Gardens," located at Plot Number four hundred and fifty six, Sector twenty nine, Gurgaon, Haryana, one hundred and twenty two thousand and one, has a waiting list longer than the queue for biryani at a Hyderabad wedding. We heard a rumour that folks are now offering their ancestral lands in exchange for a slot! Talk about serious dedication.

unnormalised: And if you're thinking of something smaller and more intimate, don't even bother calling "Sharma Farms" at Village X, Post Office Y, Zillah Allahabad, UP, 211001. They've apparently received so many inquiries that their landline has melted.
normalised: And if you're thinking of something smaller and more intimate, don't even bother calling "Sharma Farms" at Village X, Post Office Y, Zillah Allahabad, U-P, two hundred and eleven thousand and one. They've apparently received so many inquiries that their landline has melted.

unnormalised: So, to all the soon-to-be-married couples out there, start prepping your charm offensives and butter up those venue managers, because in this wedding game, it's all about who knows who and who can bribe the most efficiently. Good luck, you'll need it!
normalised: So, to all the soon-to-be-married couples out there, start prepping your charm offensives and butter up those venue managers, because in this wedding game, it's all about who knows who and who can bribe the most efficiently. Good luck, you'll need it!
